template.name: Template Server Cisco UCS SNMPv2
template.description:
Template Server Cisco UCS
MIBs used: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-PROCESSOR-MIB CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-EQUIPMENT-MIB CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB
Template tooling version used: 0.34

item_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_CACHE_LOCATION}: Disk array cache controller battery status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_CACHE_LOCATION}: Disk array cache controller battery is in critical state!
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_CACHE_LOCATION}: Disk array cache controller battery is not in optimal state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: {#DISKARRAY_CACHE_LOCATION}: Disk array cache controller battery is in critical state!

item_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller model
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB

item_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller is in critical state

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller is not in optimal state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults

dependency.name: {#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller is in critical state
{#DISKARRAY_LOCATION}: Disk array controller is in warning state

item_prototype.name: {#FAN_LOCATION}: Fan status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-EQUIPMENT-MIB Cisco UCS equipment:Fan:operState managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#FAN_LOCATION}: Fan is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the fan unit

trigger_prototype.name: {#FAN_LOCATION}: Fan is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the fan unit

discovery_rule.name: Physical Disk Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of physical drive entries CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB::cucsStorageLocalDiskTable.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Physical disk media type
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalDisk:model managed object property. Actually returns 'HDD' or 'SSD'

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Physical disk model name
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalDisk:serial managed object property. Actually returns part number code

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Disk size
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalDisk:size managed object property. In MB.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Physical disk status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalDisk:diskState managed object property.

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Physical disk error
trigger_prototype.description: Please check physical disk for warnings or errors

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Physical disk failed
trigger_prototype.description: Please check physical disk for warnings or errors

item_prototype.name: {#PSU_LOCATION}: Power supply status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-EQUIPMENT-MIB Cisco UCS equipment:Psu:operState managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#PSU_LOCATION}: Power supply is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: {#PSU_LOCATION}: Power supply is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the power supply unit for errors

dependency.name: {#PSU_LOCATION}: Power supply is in critical state

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-PROCESSOR-MIB Cisco UCS processor:EnvStats:temperature managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.IOH: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Cisco UCS compute:RackUnitMbTempStats:ioh1Temp managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.IOH: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.IOH: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Ambient: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Ambient

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Ambient: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Ambient: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Front: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Cisco UCS compute:RackUnitMbTempStats:frontTemp managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Front: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Front: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Rear: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Cisco UCS compute:RackUnitMbTempStats:rearTemp managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Rear: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_LOCATION}.Rear: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: Hardware model name
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Cisco UCS compute:RackUnit:model managed object property

item_prototype.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: Hardware serial number
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Cisco UCS compute:RackUnit:serial managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

item_prototype.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: Overall system health status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-COMPUTE-MIB Cisco UCS compute:RackUnit:operState managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: System status is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for errors

trigger_prototype.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: System status is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for warnings

dependency.name: {#UNIT_LOCATION}: System status is in critical state
dependency.expression: {Template Server Cisco UCS SNMPv2:system.status[cucsComputeRackUnitOperState.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$HEALTH_CRIT_STATUS:"computeFailed"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Cisco UCS SNMPv2:system.status[cucsComputeRackUnitOperState.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$HEALTH_CRIT_STATUS:"configFailure"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Cisco UCS SNMPv2:system.status[cucsComputeRackUnitOperState.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$HEALTH_CRIT_STATUS:"unconfigFailure"},eq)}=1 or {Template Server Cisco UCS SNMPv2:system.status[cucsComputeRackUnitOperState.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,{$HEALTH_CRIT_STATUS:"inoperable"},eq)}=1

item_prototype.name: {#VDISK_LOCATION}: Layout type
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalLun:type managed object property

item_prototype.name: {#VDISK_LOCATION}: Disk size
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalLun:size managed object property in MB.

item_prototype.name: {#VDISK_LOCATION}: Status
item_prototype.description: MIB: CISCO-UNIFIED-COMPUTING-STORAGE-MIB Cisco UCS storage:LocalLun:presence managed object property

trigger_prototype.name: {#VDISK_LOCATION}: Virtual disk is not in OK state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check virtual disk for warnings or errors
